topic.title: Customizing Frameworks and Author Mode Using Extensions, Plugins, SDK

body.p: Advanced users can extend the functionality of custom frameworks and Author mode by using plugins, extensions, or the Oxygen SDK.
There is also an API Frequently Asked Questions section that contains answers to common questions regarding API customizations.
If you want to customize the Eclipse plugin you can look at the Eclipse IDE Integration Sample Project to see how an Eclipse plugin can interact with the Oxygen APIs.
